data.name: Tank Operations: European Campaign REMASTERED
data.detailed_description:
Tank Operation: European Campaign - Remastered is a turn-based, tactical war game with a dozen nerve-racking historical scenarios on the various battlefields of World War II with more than 50 faithful, authentic military units. New graphics as well as an improved UI, revised sound effects and adjustments of the game based on community feedback adorn the remaster version.

Lead your tank corps as an allied general through the battlefields of Europe and North Africa and defeat the German "Panzer" with them.



  • NEW: Improved graphics, complete new UI, revised sound effects and adjustments of the game based on community feedback adorn the remaster version.
  • Battle scenarios were inspired by history - from the landing of Allied troops in northwestern Africa to the invasion of southern Italy and the liberation of Paris and the final battle in Berlin.
  • Engaging and intense oldschool turn-based Gameplay, feel the weight of the war on your shoulders as the AI reacts to your every move on the battlefield
  • A dozen historical scenarios to challenge your combat acumen
  • 50+ authentic combat and support units, based on real-world tanks, planes and infantry
  • Capture buildings, hide your unites or use other special skills

We were inspired by


  • Panzer Corps
  • Panzer General
  • Xcom
  • Wargroove
  • SID MEIER'S CIVILIZATION

Thanks for such good and inspiring games <3!


Big support for:
Steel Division 2

data.short_description: Tank Operation: European Campaign - Remastered is a turn-based, tactical war game with a dozen nerve-racking historical scenarios on the various battlefields of World War II with more than 50 faithful, authentic military units.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Open GL 2.0 compatible 256 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatable
  • Additional Notes: Saved files are saved in the Userâ€™s documents folder.
